title: Crowley & Aziraphale | True Love (Good Omens)

comment: "you can stay at my place...if you like" sounds so freaking romantic like wow that delivery tone

description:
"There's no one quite like you, 
You push all my buttons down
I know life would suck without you"

I've been waiting for this series for so damn long and AHH, i love these two so much. and they turned out to be so much more in love than i could have hoped. I'm gonna be trash for this ship for a while lmao. I knew i only used this song recently but i've had zero inspiration for weeks now and this is the only song i had inspiration for sooooo.
